original_text: When one of the Pharisees invited Jesus to have dinner with him, he went to the Pharisee’s house and reclined at the table.
korean_text: 한 바리새인이 예수께 자기와 함께 잡수시기를 청하니 이에 바리새인의 집에 들어가 앉으셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: When one of the Pharisees invited Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 바리새인 중 한 사람이 예수님을 초대했을 때

sentences.original_text: he went to the Pharisee's house
